main.java.controller

Interface State

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CalcState, DefaultState, DeliveryAddedState, DeliveryDeletedBeforeCalcState, DeliveryDeletedState, DeliveryLoadedState, DeliveryMovedState, DeliverySelectedBeforeCalcState, DeliverySelectedState, DurationChoiceBeforeCalcState, DurationChoiceState, InitialState, MapLoadedState, NodeSelectedBeforeCalcState, NodeSelectedState, PreviousDeliverySelectedState, SelectedPreviousMovedState

    public interface State
    The Interface State. The Interface that will define the different states of the application.
